description: Arcus cohort tool stub record schema. This schema can be used when a cohort requires metadata for display in the cohort tool but does not have a collection record.

stubIdentifier.description: A unique string that identifies a collection within Arcus.
stubIdentifier.catalogingNote: The format is dependent upon collectionIdentifierType.

restrictionsForUse.description: Field that lists any known restrictions for use, for example if data may be used only for a specific type of research.
restrictionsForUse.catalogingNote: These may be specified in the protocol or the consent, or elsewhere. This should not be used to denote restrictions related to identified vs. deidentified data- those should be noted in the fields provided for that designation.

stubRecordDescriptionValue.catalogingNote: All additional information that does not fit in any of the other categories. May be used for technical information. It is a best practice to supply a description. Free text. It is a best practice to supply a description.

@stubRecordDescriptionSource.description: System source of the value populated in the description.
@stubRecordDescriptionSource.catalogingNote: This should be filled in any time a value is extracted/taken wholesale from another existing system.

creatorsDef.description: The main researcher involved in producing the data or the authors of the publication.
creatorsDef.catalogingNote: May be a corporate/institutional or a personal name.
